about.summary: Use geometric objects as matplotlib paths and patches.

name: descartes
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}

package:
  name: descartes
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: descartes-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/d/descartes/descartes-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 078ef4b50baeafd0cbde538750911ca60161829a8696ae2c7e5a6a1071af1257

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - matplotlib

test:
  imports:
    - descartes

about:
  home: http://bitbucket.org/sgillies/descartes/
  license: BSD
  summary: 'Use geometric objects as matplotlib paths and patches.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
